result.reason: Feature request to allow custom resolution input and combine any resolution with smart sizing for RDP sessions
result.approach: Add custom resolution fields (width/height) to ConnectionInfo and allow SmartSize to be applied independently of the resolution mode, so users can set e.g. 1920x1080 with smart sizing enabled. Modify SetResolution() default case to also enable SmartSizing when configured.

attempts.raw_output:
Now I have a clear picture. The issue requests the ability to set a **custom resolution** (user-defined width/height, not from the fixed list) and combine it with **smart sizing** for RDP. Currently:

1. Resolution is an enum with fixed presets â€” no custom WxH input
2. SmartSize only works with FitToWindow-type modes, not with specific resolutions (the `default` case at line 1081 sets a fixed resolution without enabling smart sizing)
